message: Let's divide fairly, 60-40, and save our money from inflation!
Your 60/40 split seems unfair to me. How about we go 55/45 instead?  It's a good deal before inflation eats away at it further.
I can do 58-42, it's as low as I'm willing to go. Inflation is hurting me too, let's settle!
Alice, we're running out of time and the money is literally disappearing. 52/48 is my final offer - let's be reasonable and close this out.
